description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. Despite being critically damaged, it sails itself from Water 7 to Enies Lobby to rescue the crew one final time.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry's Miraculous Arrival
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry miraculously sails itself from Water 7 to Enies Lobby to rescue the Straw Hat crew, slipping past Marine warships undetected.
keyEvents.significance: The ship's final act of devotion to the crew, demonstrating its 'spirit' (Klabautermann).

keyEvents.title: Successful Escape from Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: The crew successfully escapes Enies Lobby aboard the Going Merry, sailing away into the mist.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry's final voyage with the crew.

statusHistory.reason: Ship is barely holding together, making its final voyage to save the crew

description: A judicial island of the World Government where criminals are processed. Also known as the 'Island of No Night' due to constant daylight. Left in ruins after the Straw Hats' assault and the Buster Call.

keyEvents.title: Aokiji Arrives at Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: Admiral Aokiji arrives at the ruins of Enies Lobby to survey the destruction.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the World Government's acknowledgment of defeat.

keyEvents.title: Declared Complete Defeat
keyEvents.description: Aokiji declares that Enies Lobby's destruction is an undeniable complete defeat for the World Government.
keyEvents.significance: First time the World Government suffers such a humiliating defeat.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Enies Lobby
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew successfully escapes Enies Lobby, leaving the ruined island behind.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Enies Lobby assault arc.

statusHistory.reason: Left in ruins after the Straw Hats' assault and the Buster Call bombardment

description: Massive gates that control the ocean currents between Enies Lobby, Impel Down, and Marine Headquarters. When closed, they create powerful whirlpools.

keyEvents.title: Sanji Closes the Gates of Justice
keyEvents.description: Sanji pulls the lever to close the Gates of Justice, causing massive whirlpools that disrupt Marine targeting.
keyEvents.significance: Critical tactical move that enables the Straw Hats' escape.

statusHistory.reason: Closed by Sanji to create whirlpools and aid in escape

name.japanese: 海列車パッフィング・トム

description: A sea train built by Tom that runs on the water between Water 7 and Enies Lobby. Used by the Franky Family, Galley-La foremen, and giants to escape.

keyEvents.title: Allies Escape on Puffing Tom
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family, Galley-La foremen, and giants successfully evacuate Enies Lobby aboard the Puffing Tom.
keyEvents.significance: Ensures all allies make it out safely.
